FindThe:
My {{name}} hurts.
Find it to heal me!
TutorialWelcomeIntro: Welcome into the Human Body Activity. Explore the human body in 3D with interactive layers. Switch views, highlight parts, and play fun quizzes with friends in Doctor Mode.
TutorialNetworkIntro: Click here to join the network. This will allow you to connect with other users and share your Human Body activity.
TutorialModelIntro: Click here to select one of the three Human Anatomy Models.
TutorialSettingsIntro: Click here to select a mode for the Human body activity. You can choose between 'Paint', 'Tour', and 'Doctor'.
TutorialColorIntro: Click here to select a color for the paint mode. You can choose between multiple colors such as Red, Green, Blue, etc.
TutorialZoomIntro: Click here to zoom in or out of the 3D model. This will allow you to see the model in more detail or get a broader view.
TutorialStopIntro: Click here to stop the Human Body activity. This will end your current session and return you to the main menu.
FullScreenIntro: Click here to toggle full screen mode. This will allow you to view the Human Body activity in full screen for a better experience.
TutorialOrientationIntro: Select the arrow pointing in the direction you want to rotate the board.
TutorialImageIntro: Click here to export the current view as an image in the Journal.
